data.comment: The big names in today's match at Yurtec Stadium have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 1, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Yokohama Marinos are pushing forward but Edigar Junio's finish is wide of the goal.
Futoshi Nakamura awards Sendai a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Futoshi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 7, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Sendai have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 11, Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 18, Sendai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Yokohama Marinos.
Jun Amano of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Futoshi Nakamura waits before resuming play because Jun Amano for Yokohama Marinos is still down.
Jun Amano has recovered and rejoins the match in Sendai.
In the minute 25, Sendai's Takuma Nishimura gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Yokohama Marinos defender.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Hisashi Appiah Tawiah (Sendai) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Yokohama Marinos defenders.
In the minute 26, Futoshi Nakamura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Sendai's half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
Yokohama Marinos are coming forward and Edigar Junio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 27, Sendai have a goal kick.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a Sendai throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In Sendai a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Futoshi Nakamura signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Ball safe as Sendai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Sendai are whistled for offside.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
Theerathon Bunmathan for Yokohama Marinos drives towards goal at Yurtec Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 35, Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Sendai.
In the minute 37, In Sendai Yokohama Marinos drive forward through Jun Amano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick for Sendai in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Sendai territory.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Yurtec Stadium.
In the minute 43, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sendai's half?
Corner awarded to Sendai.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yokohama Marinos's Keiya Sento gets in a shot on goal at Yurtec Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Futoshi Nakamura blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Yurtec Stadium.
The away team have replaced Keiya Sento with Yuki Otsu. This is the first substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sendai's half?
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Futoshi Nakamura awards Sendai a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 50, Yokohama Marinos surge into the attack at Yurtec Stadium but Jun Amano’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 51, Sendai have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Futoshi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Sendai's half.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
Yokohama Marinos's Jun Amano misses with an attempt on goal.
Sendai have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Futoshi Nakamura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Sendai's half.
Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos's Takuya Kida has been booked in Sendai.
In the minute 58, The home team replace Takayoshi Ishihara with Koji Hachisuka.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Sendai in their own half.
Sendai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
In the minute 64, Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sendai goal kick.
Sendai advance rapidly upfield but Futoshi Nakamura blows for offside.
In the minute 67, Ado Onaiwu is on a sub for Edigar Junio for Yokohama Marinos.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Ryo Germain gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sendai.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Sendai.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sendai close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Futoshi Nakamura signals a throw-in for Sendai, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Futoshi Nakamura awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Attention is being given to Sendai’s Ryo Germain and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 74, Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) has taken off Ryo Germain who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Takumi Mase is the replacement.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Ado Onaiwu (Yokohama Marinos) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sendai.
Futoshi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Ange Postecoglou is making the team's third substitution at Yurtec Stadium with Marcos Junior replacing Jun Amano.
In the minute 79, Kota Watanabe is on a sub for Kota Mizunuma for Yokohama Marinos.
Makito Ito is replacing Takuya Kida for the away team.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
In the minute 80, Futoshi Nakamura signals a free kick to Sendai in their own half.
Sendai make their fourth substitution with Yoshiki Matsushita replacing Kyohei Yoshino.
Takashi Kiyama (Sendai) is making a third substitution, with Alexandre Guedes replacing Kunimitsu Sekiguchi.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Sendai at Yurtec Stadium.
Yoshiki Matsushita is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Sendai to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
In the minute 84, Sendai’s Yoshiki Matsushita is on his feet again at Yurtec Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Sendai.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sendai have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Corner awarded to Sendai.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Futoshi Nakamura.
Sendai have a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Sendai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Sendai.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Yurtec Stadium.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
That's full-time at Yurtec Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
Ken Matsubara for Yokohama Marinos has been booked by Futoshi Nakamura and receives a first yellow card.
Yokohama Marinos take a 0-1 lead thanks to Marcos Junior.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sendai to check on Hisashi Appiah Tawiah, who is grimacing with pain.
